effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user hurls boulders at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by cutting off its movement.
